data.name: Time Jumper
data.detailed_description:
Play as a time traveling wizard who's being chased by a timeless entity known only as the Void. Learn to harness your time traveling abilities as you carefully maneuver through treacherous environments from both the past and the future in Time Jumper - Time Traveling Precision Platformer.

Game Features
- Master punishing but rewarding gameplay as you learn the intricacies of each level.
- Several unique levels with increasing level of difficulty.
- Multiple platforming moves to master like Charge Jump, Wall Jump, Wall Slide and Time Jump.

data.short_description: Play as a time traveling wizard who's being chased by a timeless entity known only as the Void. Learn to harness your time traveling abilities as you carefully maneuver through treacherous environments from both the past and the future in Time Jumper - Time Traveling Precision Platformer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
